title: Tend
description: Save on travel purchases and earn up to 15% cashback on everything from rental cars to plane tickets.

hero.headline: Treat yourself to more rewarding trips.
hero.sub-copy: Get best prices on travel and earn up to 15% cashback on everything from hotels to scuba diving lessons.^^

sweet-travel-deals.headline: Do more than see the sites.
sweet-travel-deals.body: All Tend members get access to our travel platform, where you can find the best prices on travel and experiences around the globe.

cash-back.headline: Get up to 15% cashback on travel.
cash-back.body: Use your Tend card to book a flight, hotel, motel or travel experiences through the Tend travel platform.  Get up to 15% back.

save-equation.book-a-trip: Book a trip and pay with your Tend card.
save-equation.get-paid: GET PAID DIRECTLY INTO YOUR SAVINGS ACCOUNT.
